Title: Successful flight search
Steps:
1. Open flight booking system
2. Enter departure and arrival locations
3. Select travel date
4. Click on 'Search Flights'
Expected Result: List of available flights is displayed with costs

Title: Select a flight and seat
Steps:
1. Search for flights
2. Select a flight from the list
3. Choose a seat from the available options
4. Click on 'Continue'
Expected Result: Seat selection is confirmed and user is taken to payment page

Title: Successful payment with card
Steps:
1. Select a flight and seat
2. Enter valid card details
3. Click on 'Pay Now'
Expected Result: Payment is processed successfully and booking confirmation is displayed

Title: Successful payment with wallet
Steps:
1. Select a flight and seat
2. Choose wallet as payment method
3. Confirm payment
Expected Result: Payment is processed successfully and booking confirmation is displayed

Title: Payment failure due to insufficient funds
Steps:
1. Select a flight and seat
2. Enter card details with insufficient funds
3. Click on 'Pay Now'
Expected Result: Error message is displayed indicating payment failure, user can retry

Title: Email confirmation after successful booking
Steps:
1. Select a flight and seat
2. Enter valid payment details
3. Complete the payment
Expected Result: Confirmation email is sent to the user

Title: Search flights with invalid date
Steps:
1. Open flight booking system
2. Enter departure and arrival locations
3. Select an invalid travel date
4. Click on 'Search Flights'
Expected Result: Error message is displayed indicating invalid date

Title: Search flights with no results
Steps:
1. Open flight booking system
2. Enter valid locations
3. Select dates with no available flights
4. Click on 'Search Flights'
Expected Result: Message displayed indicating no flights found

Title: System startup and navigation
Steps:
1. Open flight booking system
2. Navigate to flight search page
3. Check for presence of search fields
Expected Result: Flight search page loads successfully with all elements present

Title: Select seat without flight selection
Steps:
1. Open flight booking system
2. Navigate to seat selection page
Expected Result: Error message is displayed indicating no flight selected
